author: NyamakoroSilla
text:
A city in perpetual darkness
Unrelenting all pervasive gloom
Where lies the responsible
The pretenders,liars and charlatans
The rogues,thieves and people haters
Where lie they?
When the poor suffer!
#SierraLeone #SaloneTwitter 
#Africa

author: NyamakoroSilla
text: Weary is an understatement. Nothing to celebrate. Why have a public holiday when you are making life so miserable for the masses. #IndependenceDay #SierraLeone #SaloneTwitter

author: NyamakoroSilla
text: I mean last week a young man died in an entirely preventable accident. Yesterday another 10 were murdered gruesomely on the roads. Where's the police? Collecting fake degrees , suppressing human rights and acting like they are government thugs! #SaloneTwitter

author: NyamakoroSilla
text: I've never heard of the police investigating anything to enable the well being of #SierraLeone ans no rd traffic incidents no burglaries no hate crimes no abuse nothing.  Yet they have stopped teachers from meeting to discuss professional issues. #SaloneTwitter

author: NyamakoroSilla
text: There's got to be some international recourse for a nation when people deliberately get into power to bleed a country dry by thieving looting corruption and dismantling it's institutions. #SaloneTwitter

author: NyamakoroSilla
text:
#SierraLeone definitely cannot survive a second term with the current government. Abject poverty has increased a thousandfold. Corruption is through the roof. In fact people now think and act as though corruption is normal. Price increases are staggering.
#SaloneTwitter  #Africa

author: NyamakoroSilla
text: Unfortunately no one can do good work in any government that is corrupt/rotten to the core. You will soon be overcome by the bad apples. Next thing you know you're unable to tell right from wrong or you develop amnesia. #SierraLeone #SaloneTwitter #Africa

author: NyamakoroSilla
text:
"Why is life expectancy so low in Sierra Leone?
A lack of clean water, proper food resources, education about hygiene and an extreme shortage of medical facilities and trained medical personnel all contribute to the low life span."
#SierraLeone #SaloneTwitter

author: NyamakoroSilla
text:
Eastertime  we sailed our kites
Of rainbow 🌈 colours
And beautiful hues
How we long for those times
Though long gone
Yet remain.....always
Imprinted in our beings. 
Nyamacoro Silla Easter 2022. 
#Easter 
#Easter2022 #EasterSunday #HappyEaster

text: Folks with kids in the so called free education system are unhappy. All the ones I've spoken to said if they had money they'd go private. The government scamming the unsuspecting public again whilst none of their kids are in the public system #SaloneTwitter #SierraLeone

author: NyamakoroSilla
text: The auditor general was suspended in November by the government saying they received complaints about her performance. No further information has come forward on these complaints. Five months! Surely its gross abuse of power and an infringement on her human rights #SaloneTwitter
